title: Borislav
description: Dangerous redhead. Don't mess with him!

title: Ed
description: Ed is making sound wave, that makes 1 damage to all enemy minions, when played. Kinda greeting, you know...

title: FireGrachik
description: FireGrachik is shooting fire and making  nice show and also 3 dmg to enemy hero, when is killed

title: NyetRusski
description: NyetRusski is giving a shield to Hero from enemys attack (+5) when played

title: Gayush
description: Gayush is taking a care of minion team, healing randomly one of them +1 every turn, starting from being played

title: Gev
description: When Gev say 'no' - obey. When played, Gev is canceling any enemy minion spell (active or being called after deth)

title: Avik
description: Avik is increasing team spirit! Minion, standing on his left gain +1 to atk, while SantAvik is on the board

title: MasterAch
description: When played MasterAch summon 2 minions (nane-card and dave-card, hp 1, atk 1)

title: Kirakos
description: Has 50% probability to lose cool down... workaholic!
